title: "Stevens researchers use AI to spot fake news"
excerpt: "Stevens researchers worked alongside AI expert Dr. K.P. Subbalakshmi to tackle this problem using artificial intelligence. The team was able to train the algorithm to recognize fake news by using thousands of tweets and performing a “stance detection” on it."
